Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored a half-century and remained unbeaten with 50 runs.
Arshdeep Singh took four wickets for nine runs, his career-best performance.
India won by seven wickets with ten balls to spare.
Saurabh Netravalkar dismissed Virat Kohli for 0 and Rohit Sharma for 3.
USA's Nitish Kumar scored 27 runs and Steven Taylor scored 24 runs.
India's Shivam Dube scored 31 not out.
USA's Muhammad Ali-Khan bowled Rishabh Pant for 18.
India's Arshdeep Singh dismissed Shayan Jahangir and Andries Gous in the first over.
USA's Harmeet Singh was caught by Rishabh Pant off Arshdeep Singh's bowling.
India's Hardik Pandya dismissed Corey Anderson, caught by Rishabh Pant.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones reflected that the USA team was 10-15 runs short and praised the discipline of his team.
Rohit Sharma expressed relief at qualifying for the Super Eights and praised the progress of the USA team.
Arshdeep Singh expressed his pleasure with his performance and mentioned the team's support.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held in New York, and it was the last game in this stadium.
The pitch conditions in New York did not favor high-scoring games.
India joined Australia and South Africa in the Super Eights.
USA will ensure qualification for the next round if they beat Ireland on Friday.
